title: Lab Assistant
description_1: Preparation of water samples for ATP and chlorophyll-a analysis.

title: Graduate Research Assistant
description_1: Led all aspects of two 5-year research projects on Diatom—Bacteria interactions. Designed workflow to analyze genetic and transcriptomic data from 200+ algal cultures. Analyzed several genomes and transcriptomes from algal cultures and their associated bacteria.
description_2: Communicated results and insights to different audiences in multiple scientific research articles. Reviewed technical writing for multiple scientific articles.
description_3: Experienced in statistical programming and analysis using R, Python, SQL, and UNIX languages. Knowledgeable in the use of phylogenetics software, microbiome analyses, and HPC via SLURM workload manager. Wrote and maintained analytical workflows in Rmarkdown and Quarto. Maintained code repositories on Github. Basic knowledge of Shiny app development, Apache Arrow, and Rust language.
description_4: **Figure preparation**: Experienced in producing figures for scientific publications & conference materials using Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop, and R.

title: Graduate Research Assistant / JCU Cyanobacteria Collection Curator
description_1: Led all aspects of a 2-year research project to determine the evolutionary relationship of a rare, terrestrial diatom using molecular phylogenetics. Sampled dozens of sites and isolated 50+ strains of diatoms.
description_2: **Molecular Techniques**: DNA extraction, PCR amplification, gel electrophoresis, & molecular cloning.
description_3: **Curator**: Isolation and maintenance of unialgal Cyanobacteria cultures . Preparation of culture media for photosynthetic microalgae (Z8 & WC). Maintained and updated culture collection database.
description_4: **Data analysis and statistical programming**: Statistical programming using R and GIS analyses using ArcGIS.

title: Lab and Field Technician
description_1: **Taxonomic identification**: Proficient in species-level identification of diatoms. Experienced in identifying macroinvertebrates, freshwater fishes, & other algal phyla to genus level.
description_2: **Sampling methods & bioassay**: Experienced in both plotless & plot-based sampling methods. Quantitative & qualitative collection of algal and macroinvertebrate samples. Short-term Methods for Estimating the Chronic Toxicity of Effluents & Receiving Water for Freshwater Organisms.
description_3: **Algae sample preparation**: Preparation of soft algae samples & diatom slides for microscopic analysis. Preparation of phytoplankton samples for analysis using the Utermöhl method. Analysis of ash-free dry weight, ATP, & chlorophyll-a.
description_4: **Project experience**: National Rivers & Streams Assessment (2013–2014), USGS Waukegan Harbor Phytoplankton & Zooplankton assessment (2015), Cleveland Hopkins Airport Biofilm Project (2014-2016),
